name: Echo (itch) (loui4)
description:
This game is a problem solving game where you have to think logically about the puzzles in order to complete them. It involves skills such as thinking ahead and planning your future. There are 9 levels to complete.

Controls:

[WASD] to move, and [R] to restart

if you can't move, it might be due to Caps Lock

==================================

Hey there! Welcome to my game. I got this idea specifically from the theme "Future", the idea is you have to think into the future in order to complete levels. The background music is a recording I made of a song I first heard on w3, the mistakes in the recording are on purpose since I figured it would feel more informal you see.
